node.title: about_contents_0
node.description: SubNeural is a Space that enables the storage of Neural output of Dionisis Pettas. It evolves with it's creator, showcasing thought patterns about kyberphilosophy, existentialism & post-futurism.

node.title: about_contents_1
node.description: The zero-dimentional point of reference for this space is Curiocity. The rest is mathematics.

node.title: about_contents_2
node.description: The aesthetics of this space were influenced by Toby Shorin's SubPixel.space. The Insignia/Logo of the space was built upon the showcased in the 61st episode of Mr Freeman, a seried by Vladimir Ponomarev. The influences of it's creator, since bring dynamic, will be discussed in a relative entry.
